snippet.title: Nerd Survivors - Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Nerd Survivors is a bullet-heaven action rogue-lite adventure, set in the Doom & Destiny Worlds universe.
Use explosive pizzas, enchanted fidget spinners or a katamari of monsters to fight countless enemies hordes!
Repair the "Forge of Destiny" and craft the ultimate custom weapon to become the most powerful nerd in the universe!

Available NOW on #Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2648990/Nerd_Survivors/
